# Syntax-Keyword-Wielding

[![MetaCPAN](https://img.shields.io/cpan/v/Syntax-Keyword-Wielding.svg)](https://metacpan.org/release/Syntax-Keyword-Wielding)
[![Licence](https://img.shields.io/cpan/l/Syntax-Keyword-Wielding)](https://metacpan.org/dist/Syntax-Keyword-Wielding/source/LICENSE)
[![Issues](https://img.shields.io/github/issues/tobyink/p5-syntax-keyword-wielding)](https://github.com/tobyink/p5-syntax-keyword-wielding/issues)
[![CI](https://github.com/tobyink/p5-syntax-keyword-wielding/workflows/CI/badge.svg)](https://github.com/tobyink/p5-syntax-keyword-wielding/actions)
[![Coveralls](https://coveralls.io/repos/tobyink/p5-syntax-keyword-wielding/badge.svg?branch=master&amp;service=github)](https://coveralls.io/github/tobyink/p5-syntax-keyword-wielding)
[![Codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/tobyink/p5-syntax-keyword-wielding/branch/master/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/gh/tobyink/p5-syntax-keyword-wielding)

Perl 5 distribution Syntax-Keyword-Wielding; see [homepage](https://metacpan.org/release/Syntax-Keyword-Wielding)
for downloads and documentation.

Directly installing from GitHub is not recommened; download the distribution
from the CPAN.

Please report any issues via [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/tobyink/p5-syntax-keyword-wielding/issues).
